alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 10:39PM EST until January 12 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is falling, but will continue to run high through late tonight. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. The next statement will be issued by 4 AM Wednesday.
